task.summary: Added new tables, and displaying item slots.
Fixed bloody update breaking project. Also set coin count to update every second.
Added quantity to item crafting, in anticipation of item selling.
Converted some Y/N nonsense into boolean. Almost.
Added mine slots. Fixed app crash (woo!).
Attempting, and failing, to fix the app crashing.
Fixed game crash. Fixed item countdown.
Reorganised db script. Ensured ticks only run when active.
Fixing item naming in anvil interface.
Improved sell button on inventory. Added visibility of hotspots on main. Added table layout to mine interface.

MESSAGE.value: Attempting, and failing, to fix the app crashing.
Fixed game crash. Fixed item countdown.
Reorganised db script. Ensured ticks only run when active.
Fixing item naming in anvil interface.
Improved sell button on inventory. Added visibility of hotspots on main. Added table layout to mine interface.
